title: 92x1: Honoraria Ban and Cash Award for a Research Paper
summary:
The award of a prize for winning a competition does not fall within the meaning of a payment for an appearance, speech or article.  

Notes: [Note: The honoraria ban was held unconstitutional by the U.S. Supreme Court in U.S. v. National Treasury Employees Union, 513 U.S. 454 (1995).]
